properties.entry: update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 3 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.dd_tpe_id = 21 and pper.per_id in ( SELECT PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS PER JOIN (select case when tmp_prr_cod_entidad='2107' then to_char(tmp_prr_cod_cliente_entidad) when tmp_prr_cod_entidad='2059' then '2059'||LPAD(to_char(tmp_prr_cod_cliente_entidad), 10, '0') else null end as PER_COD_CLIENTE_ENTIDAD from TMP_PER_PERSONAS_RESERVADAS) PER_RESER ON PER.PER_COD_CLIENTE_ENTIDAD=PER_RESER.PER_COD_CLIENTE_ENTIDAD where per.dd_tpe_id = 21 )

update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 1 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.dd_tpe_id = 21 and pper.per_id in (SELECT DISTINCT(PER.PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN PER_PERSONAS PER ON PER.PER_ID=CPE.PER_ID LEFT JOIN DD_GCN_GARANTIA_CONTRATO gcn on gcn.DD_GCN_ID = cnt.DD_GC1_ID and gcn.DD_GCN_DESCRIPCION in ('Hipotecaria', 'HIPOTECARIA APARCAMIENTO', 'HIPOTECARIA VIVIENDA ACABADA', 'HIPOTECARIA VIVIENDAS EN CONSTRUCCION', 'HIPOTECARIA OTROS BIENES', 'HIPOTECARIA SOLAR O ACTIVO EN EXPLOTACIONCION', 'HIPOTECARIA LOCALES EN CONSTRUCCION', 'HIPOTECARIA NAVES INDUSTRIALES EN CONSTRUCCION', 'HIPOTECARIA NAVE INDUSTRIAL', 'HIPOTECARIA VIVENDA CON PARKING Y TRASTERO', 'PROMOTOR HIPOTECARIO VIVIENDA ACABADA', 'HIPOTECARIA FINCA RUSTICA, HIPOTECARIA LOCAL', 'HIPOTECARIA APARCAMIENTOS EN CONSTRUCCION', 'HIPOTECARIA ACTIU EXPLOTACIO < 50%', 'HIPOTECARIA INMOBILIARIA > 50%', 'HIPOTECARIA IMMOBILIARIA < 50%') LEFT JOIN DD_CT2_CATALOGO_2 ct2 on ct2.DD_CT2_CODIGO = tcnt.TMP_CNT_CATALOGO_2 and ct2.DD_CT2_HIPOTECARIO = 1 WHERE dd_esc_id in (21,22) AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50 AND PER.dd_tpe_id = 21 AND ((ct2.DD_CT2_CODIGO is not null or gcn.DD_GCN_ID is not null)) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN (SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS WHERE tmp_cnt_cod_extra4 in (9515, 9514) UNION SELECT tcnt2.* from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt2 WHERE tcnt2.TMP_CNT_INF_EXTRA2 = 'L') tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN DD_EFC_ESTADO_FINAN_CNT efc on cnt.DD_EFC_ID = efc.DD_EFC_ID WHERE efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'INSOLVENTE DEFINITIVO (Sbd)' or efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'SUSPENSO (Sbd)') MINUS (select distinct per.per_id from per_personas per inner join cpe_contratos_personas cpe on cpe.per_id = per.per_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) inner join cnt_contratos cnt on cnt.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id inner join tMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA inner join tmp_tca_approach tca on substr(tca.tca_contrato,-10) = lpad(cnt.cnt_contrato,10,'0')) )

update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 15 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.dd_tpe_id = 21 and pper.per_id in( SELECT PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS per WHERE dd_tpe_id = 21 AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_NO_VENCIDA + mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) < 1000 AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50 MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN (SELECT * FROM TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS WHERE tmp_cnt_cod_extra4 in (9515, 9514) UNION SELECT * FROM TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS WHERE TMP_CNT_INF_EXTRA2 = 'L') tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT per.PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS PER JOIN PRC_PER prcp on prcp.PER_ID = per.per_id JOIN PRC_PROCEDIMIENTOS prc on prc.prc_id = prcp.prc_id JOIN ASU_ASUNTOS asu on asu.asu_id = prc.ASU_ID and asu.DD_EAS_ID NOT IN (5,6)) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT per.PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS PER JOIN PEX_PERSONAS_EXPEDIENTE PEX on PEX.PER_ID = per.per_id JOIN EXP_EXPEDIENTES EXP on EXP.exp_id = pex.EXP_ID and exp.DD_EEX_ID = 2) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN DD_EFC_ESTADO_FINAN_CNT efc on cnt.DD_EFC_ID = efc.DD_EFC_ID WHERE efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'INSOLVENTE DEFINITIVO (Sbd)' or efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'SUSPENSO (Sbd)') MINUS (select distinct per.per_id from per_personas per inner join cpe_contratos_personas cpe on cpe.per_id = per.per_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) inner join cnt_contratos cnt on cnt.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id inner join tMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA inner join tmp_tca_approach tca on substr(tca.tca_contrato,-10) = lpad(cnt.cnt_contrato,10,'0')) )

update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 16 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.dd_tpe_id = 21 and pper.per_id in ( SELECT per.PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS per WHERE dd_tpe_id = 21 AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50 AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_NO_VENCIDA + mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) < 50000 MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN (SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS where tmp_cnt_cod_extra4 in (9515, 9514) UNION SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS WHERE TMP_CNT_INF_EXTRA2 = 'L') tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN DD_EFC_ESTADO_FINAN_CNT efc on cnt.DD_EFC_ID = efc.DD_EFC_ID WHERE efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'INSOLVENTE DEFINITIVO (Sbd)' or efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'SUSPENSO (Sbd)') MINUS (select distinct per.per_id from per_personas per inner join cpe_contratos_personas cpe on cpe.per_id = per.per_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) inner join cnt_contratos cnt on cnt.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id inner join tMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA inner join tmp_tca_approach tca on substr(tca.tca_contrato,-10) = lpad(cnt.cnt_contrato,10,'0')) )

update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 2 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.dd_tpe_id = 21 and pper.per_id in ( SELECT per.PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS per WHERE dd_tpe_id = 21 AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50 AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_NO_VENCIDA + mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50000 MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN (SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS where tmp_cnt_cod_extra4 in (9515, 9514) UNION SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS WHERE TMP_CNT_INF_EXTRA2 = 'L') tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN DD_EFC_ESTADO_FINAN_CNT efc on cnt.DD_EFC_ID = efc.DD_EFC_ID WHERE efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'INSOLVENTE DEFINITIVO (Sbd)' or efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'SUSPENSO (Sbd)') MINUS (select distinct per.per_id from per_personas per inner join cpe_contratos_personas cpe on cpe.per_id = per.per_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) inner join cnt_contratos cnt on cnt.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id inner join tMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA inner join tmp_tca_approach tca on substr(tca.tca_contrato,-10) = lpad(cnt.cnt_contrato,10,'0')) )

update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 18 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.dd_tpe_id = 1 and pper.per_id in ( SELECT per.PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS per WHERE dd_tpe_id = 1 AND (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50 )

update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 19 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.per_id in ( select distinct per.per_id from TMP_GESTORES_EMPRESA_CLIENTE2 tmp inner join per_personas per on ltrim(REGEXP_REPLACE(per.PER_DOC_ID , '[^0-9]', ''),'0') = ltrim(REGEXP_REPLACE(tmp.IDENTIF, '[^0-9]', ''),'0') where (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50 MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN (SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS where tmp_cnt_cod_extra4 in (9515, 9514) UNION SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS WHERE TMP_CNT_INF_EXTRA2 = 'L') tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN DD_EFC_ESTADO_FINAN_CNT efc on cnt.DD_EFC_ID = efc.DD_EFC_ID WHERE efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'INSOLVENTE DEFINITIVO (Sbd)' or efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'SUSPENSO (Sbd)') MINUS (select distinct per.per_id from per_personas per inner join cpe_contratos_personas cpe on cpe.per_id = per.per_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) inner join cnt_contratos cnt on cnt.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id inner join tMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA inner join tmp_tca_approach tca on substr(tca.tca_contrato,-10) = lpad(cnt.cnt_contrato,10,'0')) )

update per_personas pper set pper.PER_EXTRA_1 = 21 where pper.per_extra_1 is null and pper.dd_tpe_id = 2 and pper.per_id in ( SELECT per.PER_ID FROM PER_PERSONAS per left join TMP_PER_PERSONAS tper on tper.TMP_PER_NIF_CIF = per.PER_DOC_ID WHERE dd_tpe_id = 2 and (per.dd_sce_id = 112 or tper.TMP_DD_PER_EXTRA_3_CODIGO = 'S') and (select sum(mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA) from MOV_MOVIMIENTOS mov inner join CNT_CONTRATOS ccnt on ccnt.cnt_id = mov.cnt_id inner join CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS ccpe on ccpe.cnt_id = ccnt.cnt_id inner join DD_TIN_TIPO_INTERVENCION tin on tin.DD_TIN_ID = ccpe.DD_TIN_ID and tin.DD_TIN_TITULAR = 1 where ccpe.PER_ID = per.per_id and mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) ) > 50 MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN (SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS where tmp_cnt_cod_extra4 in (9515, 9514) UNION SELECT * from TMP_CNT_CONTRATOS WHERE TMP_CNT_INF_EXTRA2 = 'L') tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA) MINUS (SELECT DISTINCT(PER_ID) FROM CNT_CONTRATOS CNT JOIN CPE_CONTRATOS_PERSONAS CPE on CNT.CNT_id = CPE.CNT_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) JOIN DD_EFC_ESTADO_FINAN_CNT efc on cnt.DD_EFC_ID = efc.DD_EFC_ID WHERE efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'INSOLVENTE DEFINITIVO (Sbd)' or efc.DD_EFC_DESCRIPCION = 'SUSPENSO (Sbd)') MINUS (select distinct per.per_id from per_personas per inner join cpe_contratos_personas cpe on cpe.per_id = per.per_id and cpe.DD_TIN_ID in (210,206,208, 211) inner join cnt_contratos cnt on cnt.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id inner join tMP_CNT_CONTRATOS tcnt on tcnt.TMP_CNT_CONTRATO = cnt.CNT_CONTRATO and tcnt.TMP_CNT_COD_OFICINA = cnt.CNT_COD_OFICINA inner join tmp_tca_approach tca on substr(tca.tca_contrato,-10) = lpad(cnt.cnt_contrato,10,'0')) )

update per_personas pp set pp.PER_DOC_ID = lpad('*',10,'*'), pp.PER_TELEFONO_1 = lpad('*',10,'*'), pp.PER_TELEFONO_2 =lpad('*',10,'*'), pp.PER_EMAIL = lpad('*',10,'*'), pp.PER_NOMBRE =lpad('*',10,'*'), pp.PER_APELLIDO1 = lpad('*',10,'*'), pp.PER_APELLIDO2 = lpad('*',10,'*') where pp.per_id in ( SELECT distinct cpec.per_id FROM PER_PERSONAS PER JOIN (select case when tmp_prr_cod_entidad='2107' then to_char(tmp_prr_cod_cliente_entidad) when tmp_prr_cod_entidad='2059' then '2059'||LPAD(to_char(tmp_prr_cod_cliente_entidad), 10, '0') else null end as PER_COD_CLIENTE_ENTIDAD from TMP_PER_PERSONAS_RESERVADAS) PER_RESER ON PER.PER_COD_CLIENTE_ENTIDAD=PER_RESER.PER_COD_CLIENTE_ENTIDAD left join cpe_contratos_personas cpe on cpe.PER_ID = per.per_id left join cnt_contratos cnt on cnt.cnt_id = cpe.cnt_id left join cpe_contratos_personas cpec on cpec.cnt_id = cnt.cnt_id left join prc_per prp on prp.per_id = cpec.per_id where prp.PRC_ID is null )

update mov_movimientos mov set mov.MOV_FECHA_POS_VENCIDA = null, mov.USUARIOMODIFICAR = 'SAG', mov.FECHAMODIFICAR = sysdate where mov.MOV_ID in ( select distinct mov.mov_id from mov_movimientos mov where mov.MOV_FECHA_EXTRACCION = (select max(movv.mov_fecha_extraccion) from mov_movimientos movv) and mov.MOV_POS_VIVA_VENCIDA + mov.MOV_COMISIONES + mov.MOV_INT_MORATORIOS + mov.MOV_INT_REMUNERATORIOS + mov.MOV_GASTOS = 0 and extract(year from mov.MOV_FECHA_POS_VENCIDA) = 2 )
